summary: Requiem 1.8 patch for Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower by John Jarvis and Christine Slagman
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8.x patch for Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower by John Jarvis and Christine Slagman

Sofia has been adjusted to match Requiem's values. She has perks similar to Belrand, the spellsword mercenary in Requiem. If you change her combat[size=2] s[/size][size=2]tyle/class in her MCM menu, her perks will remain the same.[/size]
[u]
[/u][i][b]*Note: Only Sofia has been patched, Sofia's quest has not been altered/modified.*[/b][/i]


New [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59996/?]Interesting NPCs Followers Perk Addon[/url] available. Options are available for Perkus Maximus 1.x and Requiem 1.8.x.


[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Sofia.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Sofia.esp after Requiem and Sofia and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
SofiaFollower.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - Sofia.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp
